title: New: Kill Evan – One.
body: Love this debut from NY duo **Kill Evan** (Evan Lo and Ashley Bardhan). There’s an almost Dilla or Flylo vibe to the production at times, yet all wrapped up with more pop leaning songwriting. In the same way that a whole host of producers drew from Dilla at the turn of the 10’s, it has that really bold yet elegant edge to it, like diving into a cool swimming pool, again and again and again. Check it out below. Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly. One. by Kill Evan
